price: (Mwenyezi Mungu) akasema: Baada ya muda mchache watakuwa wenye kujuta.
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akamwambia Huud kuzidi kutilia nguvu ahadi yake: Baada ya muda mchache watakuja juta, kwa waliyo yafanya, itapo wateremkia adhabu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
